name: economist-blog-v5
description: Software engineering insights on quality, testing, and AI - written in The Economist's signature style.

scripts.test: npm run test:visual && npm run test:a11y && npm run test:lighthouse && npm run test:playwright
scripts.pretest: echo 'Ensure Jekyll is running on port 4000 before running tests'
scripts.dashboard: echo 'Dashboard available at: https://oviney.github.io/blog/dashboard/' && npx serve dashboard --port 8081
scripts.monitoring:full: npm run monitor:healing && npm run alert:system
scripts.deploy:dashboard: echo 'Dashboard automatically available at: https://oviney.github.io/blog/dashboard/' && echo 'Data updates by pushing to main branch or running: gh workflow run healing-monitor.yml'
